name: throat-chop
caption: Throat Chop

effect.short: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Silences the target for two turns, preventing it from using any sound-based moves.

flavorText:
The user attacks the targetâ€™s throat, and the
resultant suffering prevents the target from using
moves that emit sound for two turns.
